MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG2 postcode area of Dumfries, affecting properties in Nunwood Gardens and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 06:29am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of on site difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:37am on Tuesday 9th of February 2021.
